# Pioneer CLI

A simple CLI wallet for exploring new chains

# install as dev

```
yarn
npm run build
cd /lib
node cli.js
```


# Install with NPX

```
npx -p @pioneer-platform/pioneer-cli@1.0.17 pioneer
```

# Run with NPM

```
npx pioneer
```


### Run as global

https://github.com/glenpike/npm-g_nosudo
